A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Fans will be disappointed.

Movie critics and new fans will claim you're entitled and this movie was the best of the series.

Disney has done a great job introducing a brand new Star Wars franchise to drain what's left of the Star Wars brand George Lucas created. As a business person\, the new lightsabers\, droids\, spaceships\, etc. make new opportunities for toys\, books\, video games. Especially by eliminating the entire expanded universe of 40+ years.  Disney will reap the benefits of destroying one of the best storylines in literature and fiction. 

If you're looking for a movie with compelling character development\, an emotional plot\, and the magic and wonder of "the force"\, this isn't the movie you're looking for.
